select sb.*, u.orgId, u.id as userId, up.truename as userName from suggest_box sb left join user u on (u.id = sb.createUserId) left join user_profile up on (up.id = u.id)
sb.isShow = 1 and sb.parentId = 0
and sb.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') escape '/'
and left(sb.createDate, 4) = #{year}
order by sb.createDate desc
